alert.note: Alert for Pecos (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 30 at 2:06PM CST until February 02 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TUESDAY TO 9 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, significant icing expected. Total ice accumulations of around one tenth to one quarter of an inch. For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Pecos County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from noon Tuesday to 9 AM CST Thursday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight tonight to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452- 9292.
